statements: SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles;
SELECT article_id, title FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE publication_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT title, author FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author='Jane Smith' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT article_id, comment_text FROM comments ORDER BY comment_date ASC;
SELECT source, publication_date FROM articles WHERE author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, author, comment_text, commenter_name FROM articles JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id WHERE commenter_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT source, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM articles JOIN comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id GROUP BY source;
SELECT author, MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY latest_publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_articles FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_articles DESC;
SELECT author_name, bio FROM authors WHERE LENGTH(bio) > 100;
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE source = 'New York Times';
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, bio FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT source_name, website FROM sources WHERE website LIKE '%.com';
SELECT title, author, publication_date, source_name FROM articles INNER JOIN sources ON articles.source = sources.source_name;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, bio FROM authors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT article_id, title, source FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT source_id, name, website FROM sources WHERE website IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM articles WHERE source = 'Newspaper';
SELECT article_id, title, name AS author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM articles;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_date, title, author FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT author, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM author_articles GROUP BY author;
SELECT * FROM articles
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT a.title, a.author, s.source_name FROM articles a JOIN sources s ON a.source = s.source_id
SELECT a.title, au.first_name || ' ' || au.lastjson_name AS author_name FROM articles a JOIN author_articles aa ON a.article_id = aa.article_id JOIN authors au ON aa.author_id = au.author_id
SELECT publication_name, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM publications JOIN article_sources ON publication_id = source_id GROUP BY publication_name
